laboratory_examinations.findings: White blood cell count of 58 x 10^3/µL, hematocrit of 41.4%, platelet count of 211 x 10^3/µL, with 51 polys, 2 monocytes, 1 eosinophil, 1 promyelocyte, 13 myelocytes, 14 bands, and 5 metamyelocytes.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Initial white blood cell count rose to higher than 120 x 10^3/µL after stopping imatinib, then improved to 88 x 10^3/µL after restarting on a lower dose.
